preInfo: In case of any food allergies or intolerances, please consult our waiter.
infoTitle: Which Allergens should I declare or provide information about?
info: Although there are numerous potential allergens in food, it is ONLY MANDATORY to declare those that contain any of the following 14 elements:
endingLine: All our dishes may contain traces of allergens declared in the new EU Regulation 1169/2011. If you have any intolerance or allergy, please consult our staff for a better service.
